title: Improper handling of 0 STT transactions
body:
[comment]: # (Please replace ... with your information. Remove < and >) ### Description [comment]: # (Feature or Bug? i.e Type: Bug) *Type*: Bug [comment]: # (Describe the feature you would like, or briefly summarise the bug and what you did, what you expected to happen, and what actually happens. Sections below) *Summary*: When sending 0 STT transactions this results in: - They are marked as ETH transactions on the "Transaction history" menu of the sender - They don't appear on the "Transaction history" menu of the recipient - The recipient has different hash on the "Transaction details"/"Transaction history" pages of the sender - 0xc55cf4b03948d7ebc8b9e8bad92643703811d162 instead of 0xc55cf4b03948d7ebc8b9e8bad92643703811d162. The receiving person was the same on both cases. ![screenshot_2018-06-21-08-13-23-821_im status ethereum](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5781465/41702914-5bed2e30-753a-11e8-9f43-17961dd28f74.png) ![screenshot_2018-06-21-08-13-16-042_im status ethereum](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5781465/41702922-61155e78-753a-11e8-890a-75f780fc7768.png) - The different recipients always have the same hash: 0xc55cf4b03948d7ebc8b9e8bad92643703811d162 ![screenshot_2018-06-21-10-17-08-709_im status ethereum](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5781465/41703659-c9decd20-753c-11e8-9c5e-157d672b484e.png) - "ERC-20 Token Transfer Error (unable to locate corresponding Transfer event log), check with sender." error on Etherscan.io ![screenshot_2018-06-21-08-13-59-022_org mozilla firefox](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5781465/41702933-6677a7f4-753a-11e8-80e5-460d47d9cda2.png) Please note that none of the mentioned issues is presented when sending > 0 STT! #### Expected behavior [comment]: # (Describe what you expected to happen.) - To see the transactions marked as STT on the "Transaction history" menu of the sender - To see the transactions on the "Transaction history" menu of the recipient - To see the recipient's hash on the "Transaction details"/"Transaction history" pages of the sender - To see the unique hash of the recipient - No errors on Etherscan.io #### Actual behavior [comment]: # (Describe what actually happened.) None of the expected points is fulfilled. ### Reproduction [comment]: # (Describe how we can replicate the bug step by step.) - Open Status on 3 devices (A , B and C) - Add B and C as friends to A - Send STT 0 from A to B (it doesn't matter if you do it through the "Send transaction" menu of the "Wallet" or with the /send command) - Send STT 0 from A to C (again, it doesn't matter how you do it) ### Additional Information [comment]: # (Please do your best to fill this out.) * Status version: 0.9.21 (6082), Nightly build "June 21", http://artifacts.status.im:8081/artifactory/nightlies-local/im.status.ethereum-227014-n-fl.apk [comment]: # (Android or iOS.) * Operating System: Tested on Android, can't test it on iOS. #### Logs [comment]: # (if on Android please replicate bug whilst running adb logcat) - When /send STN 0: https://gist.github.com/GeorgiG/23ddb60048df22762f1668cea1a91ad3 - When opening "Transactions history": https://gist.github.com/GeorgiG/7775892707632baf49c03d7f7e64e614 - When opening the transaction details: https://gist.github.com/GeorgiG/28a90f57062b6e1f33b91bc81a1791c1
